thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ubiquiti Networks Posts Q2 GAAP Loss of $0.66 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ubiquiti Networks Posts Q2 GAAP Loss of $0.66 Per Share
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Ubiquiti Networks Inc:
* UBIQUITI NETWORKS REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.76 * Q2 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.66 * IN QUARTER, NET LOSS DUE TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT, WHICH RESULTED IN A $110.7 MILLION TAX EXPENSE
* NET LOSS DUE TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT, WHICH RESULTED IN A $110.7 MILLION TAX EXPENSE IN QUARTER
* QTRLY REVENUES OF $250.8 MILLION, INCREASING 17.5% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* SEES Q3 REVENUES OF BETWEEN $245 MILLION AND $260 MILLION
* Q3 REVENUE VIEW $255.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR COâ€˜S THIRD FISCAL QUARTER ENDING MARCH 31, 2018 SEES NON-GAAP DILUTED EPS OF $0.92 - $0.99
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $239.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
